title: Mini-Ep 197: Mist Connections
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 197: Mist Connections

description:
Doree starts some good digital wellness practices and Kate receives a good reminder from an unlikely source. Then, listeners call in about learning to find joy again, sniffing perfume in public, and face mist recs.


To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach us at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.

Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything we mention on the show.

Follow us on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). Sign up for the newsletter at forever35podcast.com/newsletter 


This week’s episode is sponsored by:

STRIVECTIN - Learn more at StriVectin.com. Email subscribers receive 15% off their first order.

 

AURA FRAMES - Go to auraframes.com and used code forever35 for up to $100 until May 9th!

 

CALM - For 40% off a Calm Premium subscription, head to calm.com/forever35.

 

PURPLE - Go to Purple.com/forever3510, and use promo code FOREVER3510. For a limited time, get 10% off any order of $200 or more!

 

JENNI KAYNE - Get 15% off your first order at jennikayne.com when you use code FOREVER35 at checkout.

 

ROTHY’S - For free shipping and free returns/exchanges, visit rothys.com/forever35.
